name: The Operational Art of War IV
description: The Operational Art of War IV is the new generation of operational wargames. With more flexibility than before and with a new array of exciting features, it will make you relive the most iconic battles from the dawn of the 20th Century to modern day, including the ones that never occurred!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Pentium 4 or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Video/Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card with 16 MB RAM Storage: 650 MB available space Sound Card: Any Windows compatible Additional Notes: Microsoft .Net 4.0
